name: 3D Plane Game v2.3
description:
Fly your plane through a 3D tunnel in space, avoiding obstacles by flying through holes in walls!

Enjoy :-) Press space to barrel roll

HOW IT WORKS: In summary: "set size to (100 / z)" Where "z" is the distance from the screen. (Again, thanks to amcerbu for the dividing by Z thing... (: )
